com.tangentum.phonetix.lucene
Class HitEnumeration

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.tangentum.phonetix.lucene.HitEnumeration
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Enumeration
public final class HitEnumeration
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Enumeration

An HitEnumeration adapts the results of a Lucene search to the standard Java collections.

Author:
Claus Engel

Constructor Summary
HitEnumeration(org.apache.lucene.search.Hits hits)
          Constructs an enumeration over the specified hits, which returns each document only once.
HitEnumeration(org.apache.lucene.search.Hits hits, boolean unique)
          Constructs an enumeration over the specified hits.

HitEnumeration

public HitEnumeration(org.apache.lucene.search.Hits hits,

Constructs an enumeration over the specified hits. If unique is true, each document is only returned once.
